name: One Ant Army
description:
Controls
  • Move:   AWSD
  • Fire weapon: Left Click
  • Reload: R or press left click when the ammo counter is zero
  • Toggle mode ( combat / engineer ):  E
Note: Engineer mode doesn't work yet, it will just show the engineer builder menu, press E again to return to combat mode. Change-log  v0.1.0
  • Initial upload
v0.1.1
  • Fixed wrong input controls ( change arrow keys for awsd )
  • Fixed timer issues (tweak timer delay values )
  • Add new reload input (  press "R" or Left click to reload  )
Note: Web version removed, is crashing the browser :(
